verses.verse: Then <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> against <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H182><s%> of the <S%H3571>Cushite<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> he had <S%H3947>married<s%> (for he had <S%H3947>married<s%> a <S%H3571>Cushite<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%>);

and they <S%H559>said,<s%> "Has the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H389>indeed<s%> <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H7534>only<s%> <S%H389><s%> through <S%H4872>Moses<s%>? Has He not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> through us as <S%H1571>well<s%>?" And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> it.

(Now the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H6035>humble,<s%> <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> was on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%>)

And <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to <S%H4813>Miriam,<s%> "You <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3318>come<s%> out to the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>" So the <S%H7969>three<s%> of them <S%H3318>came<s%> out.

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H6051>cloud<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent,<s%> and He <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H4813>Miriam.<s%> When they had <S%H8147>both<s%> <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H3318>forward,<s%>

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8085>"Hear<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> My <S%H1697>words:<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> there is a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> among you, I, the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> shall <S%H3045>make<s%> Myself <S%H3045>known<s%> to him in a <S%H4759>vision.<s%> I shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> with him in a <S%H2472>dream.<s%>
"Not <S%H3651>so,<s%> with My <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> He is <S%H539>faithful<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> My <S%H1004>household;<s%>

With him I <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> Even <S%H4758>openly,<s%> and not in <S%H2420>dark<s%> <S%H2420>sayings,<s%> And he <S%H5027>beholds<s%> the <S%H8544>form<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> <S%H4069>Why<s%> then were you not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> To <S%H1696>speak<s%> against My <S%H5650>servant,<s%> against <S%H4872>Moses<s%>?"
So the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2734>burned<s%> against them and He <S%H1980>departed.<s%>

But when the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> had <S%H5493>withdrawn<s%> from <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H168>tent,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> [was] <S%H6879>leprous,<s%> as [white as] <S%H7950>snow.<s%> As <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H4813>Miriam,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> she [was] <S%H6879>leprous.<s%>

Then <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H994>"Oh,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> I <S%H994>beg<s%> you, do not <S%H7896>account<s%> [this] <S%H9128>sin<s%> to us, in <S%H834>which<s%> we have <S%H2973>acted<s%> <S%H2973>foolishly<s%> and in <S%H834>which<s%> we have <S%H2398>sinned.<s%>
<S%H4994>"Oh,<s%> do not let her be like one <S%H4191>dead,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H398>eaten<s%> away when he <S%H3318>comes<s%> from his mother's womb!"
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6817>cried<s%> out to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "O <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H7495>heal<s%> her, I <S%H4994>pray!<s%>"

But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "If her father had but <S%H1>spit<s%> in her <S%H3417>face,<s%> would she not <S%H6440>bear<s%> her <S%H3637>shame<s%> for <S%H3637>seven<s%> <S%H7651>days<s%>? Let her be <S%H3117>shut<s%> up for <S%H5462>seven<s%> <S%H7651>days<s%> <S%H3117>outside<s%> <S%H4480><s%> the <S%H2351>camp,<s%> and <S%H4264>afterward<s%> she may be <S%H310>received<s%> again."

So <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> was <S%H5462>shut<s%> up <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> did not <S%H5265>move<s%> on <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> was <S%H622>received<s%> again.
<S%H310>Afterward,<s%> however, the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5265>moved<s%> out from <S%H2698>Hazeroth<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6290>Paran.<s%>
